summary: Magnesium citrate is a compound made from citrate and magnesium ions, which are salts. One type has an equal ratio of magnesium and citric acid (1:1). It contains 11.33% magnesium. This substance is used as a laxative to clear the bowels before surgery or a colonoscopy, and it's available without a prescription. It can also be taken as a magnesium supplement or used as a food additive to control acidity, known as E345.
title: Magnesium citrate
